stages.logText:
After giving him the key of Luthor and talking with Umar about Andor, I needed to ask him about Thieves' Guild itself.
I want to join them to see what kind of jobs they do.
Umar told me to talk with Troublemaker regarding my first task for the Guild.

Troublemaker told me to bring him three journals from spies of the guild. I have to talk with Leta in my village, then with Dunla in Vilegard's tavern, and finally with Fanamor somewhere around Crossroads guardhouse.
I have to remember to tell them the password "You are no one. No one knows you. No one has seen you."
Leta gave me her journal and advised me to not raise suspicion.
I got Dunla's journal without any problem. I have set out to get the last journal.
Fanamor gave me her journal.
Fanamor has been gravely wounded, and the Feygard Scout grabbed the journal.
After I had killed the Feygard scout I talked again with Fanamor. She's losing blood quickly, so I have to bring her a bandage. I need to find a trustworthy priest.
Thoronir gave me a bandage. I have to return to Fanamor as soon as possible.
Unfortunately, I was not able to save Fanamor's life. However, I did get her journal.
Fanamor is alive and will find her own way to return.
I returned to Troublemaker and gave him the journals. He told me to talk with Umar.

After completing my first task I'm considered a member of Thieves' Guild. Now I have to perform a very risky task. Umar sent me to kidnap a noble woman from Feygard, without being discovered. She was recently seen in the Foaming Flask tavern.
Umar gave me some advice. My strength is not always the solution. I must "use my tongue" to avoid raising suspicion in the tavern.
Ambelie Laumwill doesn't want to come with me peacefully. I cannot make a scene, or the guards will alert other patrols. Maybe talking with them would solve the situation.
I have "used my tongue" with the main Feygard soldier in the Foaming Flask tavern. He gave me permission to "escort back" Ambelie.
I knocked out Ambelie. I will take her back to the Guild.
I have decided not to kidnap Ambelie. I must think of another solution.
Ambelie gave me a very valuable neckace. I must talk with Umar and persuade him to no longer pursue her.
I safely brought Ambelie to the basement. However, keeping her here could be dangerous.
Umar believes there is a secure room for these types of "visitors". I should talk to Troublemaker.
I have talked to Troublemaker about the place Umar believes it's okay to safely keep the hostage.
Troublemaker has given me the key to the Guild brig. I should take Ambelie there and leave her to wake up.
I've inserted the key and moved the lever. A hatchway has opened in the room.
I left Ambelie in that ugly, dark, and cold place...I should go back.
Troublemaker gave me some bread for Ambelie. The guild doesn't want her to starve to death. Indeed, they want her to be as confortable as possible. I must go to the brig again.
I gave the bread to Ambelie. I should report Troublemaker that I completed the job.
The job finally seems to be finished. I just have to talk with Umar again. However, I do not feel good about this. Kidnappings are definitely not my kind of job.
I completed this task successfully. Umar told me they have sent couriers to Feygard, and the ransom is almost guaranteed. He paid me for my work.
Umar took the necklace as compensation for my errors. Everything is fine again.
Time to rest and prepare myself to begin with the next job.I should go to the tavern.
I really need to take a break...
I'm now fully rested,so I should go back to Umar.
Umar told me about a group of traitors led by a Guild's veteran.It seems he stole the Key of Luthor.
Umar told me the story about the one who is known by "Crack shot".He's probably the responsible of the murder in the Duleian road.
Crackshot and his henchmen are probably hiding somewhere in the Duleian road.I must ask people there whether they have seen'em.
Benbyr,a suspicious man outside Crossroads Guardhouse,seems to don't know what I'm talking about.
Crossroads guards told me that Feygard has sent more soldiers to the south, trying to find the criminals' hideout.

The barricade guard speaks too loud,but he said all I wanted to know.I need to be faster than the patrols and reach the hideout.
The hideout is near a place full of larval burrowers.
I've found a small hole which apparently leads to a cave.Probably Crackshot and his henchmen are hiding there.
I've reached the hideout and saw some recent blood stains...Maybe people were fighting there.
The blood trace goes further...
I've heard screams and sword clashes near here...I should take a look.
That's a massacre.The feygard patrol reached the place,but they seem to have been killed.However,I must continue.
While I'm going through the corridor the air becomes thicker.The blood smell is stronger and I find another dying soldier.He tells me something about his sergeant and other guy.
While I'm going through the corridor the air becomes thicker.The blood smell is stronger and I find a dying soldier.He tells me something about his sergeant and other guy.
I find another dying soldier. That's a massacre.The feygard patrol reached the place,but they seem to have been killed.However,I must continue.
I've found the patrol sergeant. He adviced me to leave this dangerous place.
The patrol sergeant told me his history about what happened before.He's tired and wounded,so I'll avenge his fellows.
The patrol sergeant has left to call backup.Now I'm alone again.Time to defeat Crackshot.
I killed Crackshot and he had the key of Luthor with him. I have to go back and report Umar.
I've tried to open the door behind Crackshot, but somehow I cannot introduce the key into the lock.
The dying Crackshot said something about the key.If he hasn't lied, It could be cursed.
I've tried to open the door behind Crackshot, but somehow I cannot introduce the key into the lock.
I've reported Umar about the situation and given him the key.He does not seem to want to tell me more about the key...Yet.
Finally, this job is done.Now I should take a rest and regain strength.
Must be never fulfilled
Block road1
Remove block road1
thieves3 - Found patrol 1
thieves3 - Found patrol 2
thieves3 - Open chest
thieves3 - Open door (can currently not be fulfilled, beause the blessed key of luthor can't be obtained in the game)
Talked about thieves to Thoronir
